searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT base.PKID, base.CASE_CODE, base.CTM_CODE, base.PROPERTY_ADDR, base.AGENT_NAME, base.AGENT_PHONE, base.GRP_NAME, base.LEADING_PROCESS_ID AS LEADING_PROCESS_ID_OLD, base.ORG_ID AS ORG_ID_OLD, --交易顾问id mortgage.MORT_TYPE AS MORT_TYPE_OLD, mortgage.SIGN_DATE, ISNULL(mortgage.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,0)/10000 MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,--总金额 ISNULL(mortgage.COM_AMOUNT,0)/10000 COM_AMOUNT,--shangdai ISNULL(mortgage.PRF_AMOUNT,0)/10000 PRF_AMOUNT,--gongjij (Select FO.FIN_ORG_NAME from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FO where FO.FIN_ORG_CODE=mortgage.fin_org_code) FIN_ORG_NAME, (Select FOYC.FIN_ORG_NAME_YC from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FOYC where FOYC.FIN_ORG_CODE=mortgage.fin_org_code) FIN_ORG_NAME_YC, (Select FOCODE.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FOCODE where FOCODE.FIN_ORG_CODE=mortgage.fin_org_code)FA_FIN_ORG_CODE, (select TOP 1 FIN_ORG_NAME_YC from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in ( select distinct FA_FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in(select FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_SUP ts where ts.SUP_CAT='0' and ts.FIN_ORG_CODE=mortgage.FIN_ORG_CODE))) FENHANG, mortgage.loanlost_apply_reason, (SELECT top 1 uu.org_name from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB uu where uu.ORG_ID=mortgage.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM) ORG_NAME, (select top 1 org2.ORG_NAME orgName1 from sctrans.sys_org org1 left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj on org1.ID=uoj.ORG_ID left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj1 on org1.PARENT_ID=uoj1.ORG_ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG org2 on org2.ID=uoj1.ORG_ID where org1.PARENT_ID in ( 'FF5BC56E0E4B45289DAA5721A494C7C5', '8a8493d453141f3301532c9568011af9', 'd5878adf8b0c4032aeae895c701ed693', 'de81a98a8ec341caa8e9bc77c46cd370', '54b3233fdf994d9987e7c8febc223588', '960089538bc54a9a9139ef52ceb45b33', '6114AB949B4445828D4383977C4FAC71', '6a84979158b942b78a8a5921cc30b8c3') and org1.ID=mortgage.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM) ORG_ORG_NAME, WK.TASK_DEF_KEY_, WK.END_TIME_, WK.START_TIME_, WK.real_name, U.REAL_NAME CASEOPERATOR, (SELECT SU.ORG_ID FROM sctrans.SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.ID=base.AGENT_CODE AND SU.IS_DELETED=0) ORG_ID FROM (SELECT * FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 0 AND (MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002','') OR MORT_TYPE IS NULL)) mortgage INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE C ON C.CASE_CODE=mortgage.CASE_CODE AND C.LOAN_REQ='1' INNER JOIN sctrans.V_CASE_LIST_BASE base ON mortgage.CASE_CODE = base.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER U ON u.ID = base.LEADING_PROCESS_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT W.CASE_CODE, taskInst.TASK_DEF_KEY_, (SELECT TOP 1 aht.END_TIME_ FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST aht WHERE aht.task_def_key_='LoanlostApproveDirector' AND aht.PROC_INST_ID_=taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ ORDER BY aht.id_ desc) END_TIME_, --taskInst.END_TIME_, taskInst.START_TIME_, guser.real_name FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW w INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST taskInst ON taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ = w.INST_CODE AND taskInst.task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector') AND taskInst.ID_ = (SELECT MAX(ID_) FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ and DELETE_REASON_='completed' AND task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector')) INNER JOIN sctrans.sys_user guser ON guser.username = taskInst.ASSIGNEE_ AND guser.available = '1' AND guser.is_deleted = '0' --AND w.BUSINESS_KEY in ( 'LoanLost_Process','operation_process') AND w.STATUS IN ('0', '4') AND w.PKID = (select max(PKID) from sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW WHERE CASE_CODE = w.CASE_CODE AND STATUS IN ('0', '4')) ) AS WK ON WK.CASE_CODE = base.CASE_CODE
where ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C INNER JOIN sctrans.v_yucui_org_hierarchy orgHierarchy ON orgHierarchy.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID WHERE C.CASE_CODE = base.CASE_CODE <!-- <ifNotNull idflag> AND C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> --> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND (orgHierarchy.TEAM_ID=#queryorgs# or orgHierarchy.DISTRICT_ID=#queryorgs# or orgHierarchy.hq_id=#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull> ) ) <ifNotNull idflag> AND (mortgage.LOAN_AGENT = #userId# or (mortgage.LOAN_AGENT is null and mortgage.CREATE_BY = #userId#) ) </ifNotNull> <if test="srvCode!=null"> AND ( 1=2 <if test="srvCode.contains('NULL')"> or (mortgage.MORT_TYPE ='' or mortgage.mort_type is null) </if> <if test="srvCode.contains('30016001')"> or ( mortgage.mort_type ='30016001') </if> <if test="srvCode.contains('30016002')"> or ( mortgage.mort_type ='30016002') </if> ) </if>

column.name: ORG_ORG_NAME
column.title: 主办人所属贵宾服务部
